How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

How I envisioned the ideal solutions I curated above :

  • Service Portal for user feedback (text /voice/attachment input). 
  • Now Assist / Predictive Intelligence for sentiment analysis.
  • Performance Analytics dashboards for categorized insights.
  • Flow Designer for routing urgent issues to respective agencies.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Yes, there are specific technical dependencies for the proposed solution, with the primary one being the integration of a Natural Language Processing (NLP) engine, (Now Assist) which is essential for core functionalities like analyzing text, understanding user intent, and generating automated responses.

Furthermore, to enable the proposed social media monitoring and engagement features, the solution has optional technical dependencies on the official API feeds from platforms like X (formerly Twitter) and Facebook, these APIs are required to programmatically fetch data, post updates, and interact with users on those platforms.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

The main challenges would be accurately moderating politically sensitive content without censoring legitimate speech, and effectively preventing spam and duplicate submissions without blocking genuine users.
